      • createAdidasDialog

        public android.app.Dialog createAdidasDialog(int dialogLayoutResId,
                                             java.lang.CharSequence dialogTitle)
        Create an AlertDialog Adidas styled with a custom title and layout resource id.
        Parameters:
        dialogLayoutResId - The resource id of the layout to use for the dialog
        dialogTitle - The title of the dialog
        Returns:
        A styled AlertDialog

      • createAdidasDialog

                                             java.lang.CharSequence dialogMessage)
        Create an basic AlertDialog Adidas styled with a title and message.
        Parameters:
        dialogTitle - The title of the dialog
        dialogMessage - The message of the dialog
        shouldCloseActivity - Whether to close the application on close or not
        Returns:
        A styled AlertDialog
